DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the pharmacokinetics of oral Ixabepilone.
DOC.brief_title: Ixabepilone Administered as an Enteric Coated Formulation.
DOC.criteria: ECOG status of 02. Unable to swallow pills. Current or recent GI disease or GI surgery. Brain mets. Severe nerve damage. ANC <1,500/mm3 Platelets <125K. Bilirubin >=1.5 times the IULN. ALT/AST >=1.5 times the IULN. Creatine >1.5 times the IULN. Prior treatment with Ixabepilone. Strong use of CYPP450 drugs.
